title: PokeUI
description: A modern, interactive interface for browsing Pokémon data via PokeAPI. This application transforms raw API data into a visually engaging dashboard, allowing users to explore stats, evolution chains, and move sets with a fluid user experience.

features.title: Smart Search & Filtering
features.description: Instantly search for Pokémon by name or ID, and filter results by elemental type or generation.

features.title: Interactive Stat Radar
features.description: Visualizes base stats (HP, Attack, Defense, etc.) using dynamic radar charts for easy comparison.

features.title: Evolution Chain Visualizer
features.description: A recursive component that maps out complex evolution trees, including special conditions for evolution.

features.title: Lazy Loading & Caching
features.description: Optimized performance with infinite scrolling and local caching to minimize API requests.
